mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FILE (ID, FILE_NM, BOARD_NO, ORIGIN_NM, RES_DATE, FILE_PATH, FILE_SIZE) VALUES (#{id}, #{name}, #{no}, #{orgNm}, NOW(), #{filePath}, #{size})
mapper.select: SELECT ORIGIN_NM, DATE_FORMAT(RES_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d'), FILE_SIZE, BOARD_NO, FILE_NM, ID FROM FILE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{no} AND DEL_YN IS NULL
